HotelElement.Name: Komune Resort and Beach Club Greenmount Beach

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Komune - Gold Coast places you in the heart of Coolangatta, walking distance from Greenmount Beach and Coolangatta Beach. This beach aparthotel is within close proximity of Snapper Rocks and Centro Tweed.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 19 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with showers are provided.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub.

Dining
Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a beach bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include laundry facilities and an elevator (lift). Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a beach bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Greenmount Beach - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Coolangatta Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Snapper Rocks - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Centro Tweed - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Point Danger Light - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Point Danger - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Duranbah Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
The Strand - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Kirra Beach - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Border Park Raceway - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Bilinga Beach - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Fingal Lighthouse - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Coolangatta and Tweed Heads Golf Club - 4.9 km / 3 mi
John Flynn Private Hospital - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Tugun Beach - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi

The preferred airport for Komune - Gold Coast is Gold Coast, QLD (OOL-Coolangatta) - 3.1 km / 2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
